org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.api.rpc

Interface RpcRouter<T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.RpcService>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of RpcService for which router provides routing information and route selection.
    All Superinterfaces:
    RouteChangePublisher<java.lang.Class<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.BaseIdentity>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RpcRouterCodegenInstance

    public interface RpcRouter<T extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.RpcService>
extends RouteChangePublisher<java.lang.Class<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.BaseIdentity>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>>
    RpcRouter is responsible for selecting RpcService based on provided routing context identifier RpcRoutingTable#getContextIdentifier() and path in overall data tree (@link InstanceIdentifier.
    Author:
    Tony Tkacik
